description: This file defines the AppHeader widget, a custom Flutter app bar with optional search functionality, used as a reusable header component across the mobile app.

classes.name: AppHeader
classes.description: A custom Flutter widget implementing PreferredSizeWidget, representing the app header with optional search bar.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the AppHeader, including the AppBar and optional search input.

methods.name: preferredSize
methods.description: Returns the preferred size of the AppHeader widget.
